unnormalised: For clarity, Civil Law deals with disputes b/w individuals/orgs, unlike Criminal Law. Think property disputes or breach of contract (e.g. Sec 73 of the Indian Contract Act, 1872); consult a lawyer if the claim exceeds Rs. 20,000.
normalised: For clarity, Civil Law deals with disputes between individuals or organizations, unlike Criminal Law. Think property disputes or breach of contract for example Section seventy three of the Indian Contract Act, one thousand eight hundred and seventy two; consult a lawyer if the claim exceeds rupee twenty thousand.
